effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.6 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 720,671.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

spells.description: Equip: Taking Nature damage increases your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, and Versatility by 501 for 60 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.6 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 720,671.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

spells.description: Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 498,357, and grants you up to 10,425 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,278 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 191 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
